etymologies: Middle English: from Latin incestus, incestum ‘unchastity, incest’, from in- ‘not’ + castus ‘chaste’

definitions: sexual relations between people classed as being too closely related to marry each other.
shortDefinitions: sexual relations between people classed as being too closely related to marry each other

definitions: the crime of having sexual intercourse with a parent, child, sibling, or grandchild.
shortDefinitions: crime of having sexual intercourse with parent
